name: A More Logical Grammar
description: Professor Kyle decided to write a test in translating a fake language! {{url_for("problem.txt", display="Here")}} is the test. Can you get a perfect score?
hints: While the characters are Japanese, the language is not. The flag is the answer key with the answer for each problem separated by commas and a single space. Ex. lasactf{a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j} could be a flag.
author: Niels
